DOC.brief_summary: The objective present trial test follow three hypothesis anovulatory woman PCOS : 1 . Acupuncture protocol 1 plus CC ( Arm A ) likely result live birth acupuncture protocol 2 combine CC ( Arm B ) , 2 . Acupuncture protocol 2 plus CC ( Arm B ) likely result live birth acupuncture protocol 1 plus placebo ( Arm C ) , 3 . Acupuncture protocol 1 plus placebo ( Arm C ) likely result live birth acupuncture protocol 2 plus placebo ( Arm D ) .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Clomiphene Citrate Live Birth Anovulatory Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , control , 2 2 factorial clinical trial Chinese woman PCOS . Primary outcome : - Live birth rate Secondary outcome : - Ovulation rate - Ongoing pregnancy rate - Multiple pregnancy rate - Miscarriage rate - Hormonal profile - Metabolic profile - Side effect profile
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age woman 20 40 year . Confirmed diagnosis PCOS accord modify Rotterdam criterion subject must anovulation plus either polycystic ovary and/or hyperandrogenism . Patency least one tube normal uterine cavity show hysterosalpingogram , HyCosi diagnostic laparoscopy . Semen analysis : 1. . Sperm concentration ≥15×106/ml b. total motility ( a+b+c ) ≥40 % forward motility ( a+b ) ≥32 % semen analysis husband ( base World Health Organization , 2010 ) . 2 . Total motile sperm count ≥9 million [ base WHO ( 2010 ) criterion , volume 1.5 ml ; conc 15 million ; motility 40 % . 1.5 x 15 x 0.04=9 million ] . 2 . Exclusion endocrine disorder Patients hyperprolactinemia ( define two prolactin level least one week apart 25 ng/mL great determine local normative value ) . The goal eliminate patient document hyperprolactinemia decrease heterogeneity PCOS population . These patient may candidate ovulation induction alternate regimen ( dopamine agonist ) . A normal level within last year treatment adequate entry . Patients FSH level > 15 mIU/mL . A normal level within last year adequate entry . Patients uncorrected thyroid disease ( define TSH < 0.2 mIU/mL > 5.5 mIU/mL ) . A normal level within last year adequate entry . Patients diagnose Type I Type II diabetes poorly control ( define glycohemoglobin level > 7.0 % ) , patient receive antidiabetic medication insulin , thiazolidinediones , acarbose , sulfonylurea likely confound effect study medication ; patient currently receive metformin XR diagnosis Type I Type II diabetes PCOS also specifically exclude . Patients suspect Cushing 's syndrome . Use hormonal medication include Chinese Herbal prescription may affect outcome least past 2 month . Pregnancy within past 6 week . Within 6 week postabortion postpartum . Breastfeeding within last 6 month . Acupuncture within last 6 month . Not willing give write consent study . Additional exclusion criterion Patients oral contraceptive , depot progestin , hormonal implant ( include Implanon ) . A two month washout period require prior screening patient agent . Longer washouts may necessary certain depot contraceptive form implant , especially implant still place . A onemonth washout require patient oral cyclic progestin . Patients liver disease define AST ALT > 2 time normal total bilirubin > 2.5 mg/dL . Patients renal disease define BUN > 30 mg/dL serum creatinine > 1.4 mg/dL . Patients significant anemia ( Hemoglobin < 10 g/dL ) . Patients history deep venous thrombosis , pulmonary embolus , cerebrovascular accident . Patients know heart disease likely exacerbated pregnancy . Patients history , suspect cervical carcinoma , endometrial carcinoma , breast carcinoma . A normal Pap smear result require woman 21 . Patients current history alcohol abuse . Alcohol abuse define > 14 drinks/week binge drinking . Patients enrol simultaneously investigative study require medication , proscribe study medication , limit intercourse , otherwise prevent compliance protocol . Patients anticipate take longer one month break protocol enrol . Patients take medication know affect reproductive function metabolism . These medication include oral contraceptive , GnRH agonists antagonist , antiandrogens , gonadotropin , antiobesity drug , Chinese herbal formula , antidiabetic drug metformin thiazolidinediones , somatostatin , diazoxide , ACE inhibitor , calcium channel blocker . The washout period medication two month . Patients suspect adrenal ovarian tumor secrete androgen . Couples previous sterilization procedure ( vasectomy , tubal ligation ) reverse . The prior procedure may affect study outcome , patient reverse sterilization procedure PCOS rare enough exclusion adversely affect recruitment . Subjects undergone bariatric surgery procedure recent past ( < 12 month ) period acute weight loss advise pregnancy bariatric surgeon . Patients untreated poorly control hypertension define systolic blood pressure 160 mm Hg diastolic 100 mm Hg obtain two measure obtain least 60 minute apart . Patients know congenital adrenal hyperplasia .
